summary: The implementation successfully addresses all 7 requirements. The diff shows a complete start tracking application with Start/No Start/Reset buttons, count displays, percentage calculation with 4 decimal places, and a warm earth tone design using OKLCH color system (terracotta, sage green, cream) with Inter font. However, the BuildRequest specifies persistence across page refreshes, which requires verification beyond the static diffâ€”the backend uses in-memory variables that would reset on canister restart, though local state persistence isn't explicitly shown in the diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Start count persists across page refreshes
missing_requirements.reason: Backend uses in-memory variables (var startCount = 0) that reset on canister restart. No evidence of stable storage or persistence mechanism in backend/main.mo.

missing_requirements.requirement: No-start count persists across page refreshes
missing_requirements.reason: Backend uses in-memory variables (var noStartCount = 0) that reset on canister restart. No evidence of stable storage or persistence mechanism in backend/main.mo.

missing_requirements.requirement: Reset action persists across page refreshes
missing_requirements.reason: While reset functionality works, persistence depends on backend storage which uses non-stable variables that won't survive canister upgrades.
